name: Human
description: Humans are a diverse and adaptable species, having spread across the temperate moon of Atlah in great numbers. They are known for having many different types of cultures and beliefs, so much so that they often find themselves quarreling with each other.

options.name: Medium
options.description: Humans are medium sized creatures and suffer no penalties or benefits.

options.name: Versatile
options.description: Humans are known for their incredible adaptability. You start with an additional talent point.

options.name: Daily Reaction : Human Destiny
options.description: The threads of destiny bend around humans, allowing them the opportunity to defy fate. In response to rolling on the lifeline table after knowing the result, you replace the result of the roll with one of the other options on the table.

options.name: Human Bloodline
options.description: Humans have adapted at mixing their bloodline with other ancestries. Choose your bloodline:

subchoices.name: Pureblooded
subchoices.description: You are a pure-blooded human and are especially adaptable. Gain +1 skill with resilience.

subchoices.name: Half-Orc
subchoices.description: You are a mixture of orc and human, sharing a mix of physical traits that makes your lineage easily identifiable. Your skin is tougher, granting you +1 physical mitigation and causing you to be immune to cosmetic injuries.

subchoices.name: Half-Elf
subchoices.description: You are a mixture of elf and human, sharing a mix of physical traits that makes your lineage easily identifiable. You are less likely to be affected by both light and dark magic, granting you +2 mitigation to dark and divine damage.

subchoices.name: Half-Arakhan
subchoices.description: You are a mixture of arah-ka and human, sharing a mix of physical traits that you makes your lineage easily identifiable. Your skin is especially suited for warm environments, granting you +3 heat mitigation.
